thread.section_title: Hotel Diocleziano - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great Location, Great Service
thread.title_full: Great Location, Great Service - Review of Hotel Diocleziano, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: nancy d
title: Great Location, Great Service
text: 5 minute walk to Termini. We felt safe walking to the hotel with our luggage. We also took the metro to other parts of the city from the Termini metro stop. Breakfast was great. We loved the cappuccino they made for us every morning. Staff was also kind enough to make reservations for us at a nice restaurant near by. The free mini bar was an added treat!
